metadata.title: CVE-2018-1099 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - low.
metadata.description: DNS rebinding vulnerability found in etcd 3.3.1 and earlier. An attacker can control his DNS records to direct to localhost, and trick the browser into sending requests to localhost (or any other address).

notes.note: msalvatore> Waiting for upstream to backport fix to 3.2 branch. See https://github.com/etcd-io/etcd/issues/10479

criterions.comment: etcd package in kinetic is affected and needs fixing.
